name: Shane Smith
coverLetter: I don't have any previous experience working with cannabis, but I am a veteran smoker.  I have worked in the mental health/care giving field for about 4 years as well as a few customer service and construction jobs. I'm just ready for a change of pace! I am a very hard worker and a very quick learner so I know I won't have a problem picking things up quickly. I don't require any special accommodations and I'm interested in working full-time for as long as possible!
contact: You can contact me by email at: sgtshamus@msn.com or by phone at: 360-281-0166
